attributes.comment:
As a very interested party in the whole immigration debate I see these fee
increases to have a negative impact on the whole problem.

We, as a country, need to make the "legal" immigration process easier and
cheaper to encourage legal immigation instead of illegal immigration.

7 years and $15000 (attorney and filing fees) to go through employment based
immigration makes it extremely difficult for the average immigrant. When the legal
path is so difficult and costly, it surely encourages people to come in illegally and
stay below the radar.

I am AGAINST any type of amnesty, as this just rewards those who break the
law. And those who break the law should "on principle" not be welcomed.

We need to fix the "legal" immigration system and this fee increase will only
breaks the system more.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Sean Gates
